description: The virus reproduction rate is above 1.0 in Germany - but experts believe it can be controlled.
title: Coronavirus: Germany not alarmed by infection rate rise
title_page: Coronavirus: Germany not alarmed by infection rate rise - BBC News
maintext: "If the second decimal digit were above 1 that would not yet be critical. But the higher it goes above 1, like 1.2 or 1.3 and over a longer period of time, it would create a situation where we would pay very close attention and think about measures how to countersteer that," Mr Schaade said.
